page.title: 02Weston
page.content: Most people work outside the village. However other people like the Vicar and Mr.Young,the proprietor of the village store work in the village. The shop sells wide variety of groceries and dry goods. It also has the Postal Franchise. Farmers in the area work at home milking the cattle and planting crops or collecting them.There is one school in the area Weston County Primary School where most children in Weston attend.There is a Church and a Chapel in Weston.Old people go to the Chapel more than the Church as it is nearer their homes.When children from Sunday School do a play the old people go to the Church.There is also a pub where people go at night or on a Sunday for a meal.The population of the village is 749.
